thread.title: Israeli police recommend bribery charges against Netanyahu

title: Israeli police recommend bribery charges against Netanyahu
text:
Israeli police recommend bribery charges against Netanyahu 8:23pm GMT - 00:47 
Police investigating Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu have recommended to the country's attorney general that he be charged with bribery in two cases. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Police investigating Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu have recommended to the country's attorney general that he be charged with bribery in two cases. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EGqFhQ
